lead_paragraph: Real Madrid striker Karim Benzema said he was denied the chance to play for France in the Euro 2016 this month because of his Algerian origins.

headline.print_headline: French Racism Cost Me Euro 2016 Spot, Says Benzema
headline.main: French Racism Cost Me Euro 2016 Spot, Says Benzema

snippet: Real Madrid striker Karim Benzema said he was denied the chance to play for France in the Euro 2016 this month because of his Algerian origins....
